title: Remove DNS Setup option from navigation menu

requirements.text: Remove the 'DNS Setup' menu item from the Navigation component's menuItems array to eliminate it from both desktop and mobile navigation menus

quotes: in the menu DNS Setup option still exists please remove

acceptanceCriteria: The 'DNS Setup' link no longer appears in the desktop navigation menu
The 'DNS Setup' link no longer appears in the mobile navigation menu
The menuItems array in Navigation.tsx does not contain any entry with label 'DNS Setup' or 'DNS Guide'

requirements.text: Remove any 'dns-guide' or 'dns-setup' section ID references from the Navigation component's scroll handling and active state logic

quotes: in the menu DNS Setup option still exists please remove

acceptanceCriteria: No references to 'dns-guide' or 'dns-setup' exist in the Navigation component's scroll event handlers
No references to 'dns-guide' or 'dns-setup' exist in the Navigation component's active section state logic

constraints: Do not modify the Navigation component's core scroll and highlighting functionality
Preserve all other existing menu items (Home, About Us, Team, Products, Farmer Support, Contact)
nonGoals: Modifying other sections of the website
